directions: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, celery, and spinach. Cook and stir until just softened, about 3 minutes. Pour in water; add tofu and salt. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer until heated through, about 8 minutes.
Stir in miso; simmer until dissolved, about 5 minutes. Season with ground black pepper and chili powder.
ingredients: ⅓ cup packed baby spinach, chopped
1 (8 ounce) container medium-firm tofu, diced into small cubes
title: Fabulous and Quick Vegan Miso Soup
